title: 延迟过高
txt_content:
本帖最后由 13933243955 于 2020-7-31 16:43 编辑 





图片.png (112.23 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-7-31 16:40 上传





如图延迟过高如何解决

另如何将tab里的延迟删掉

# Detailed explanation of all options available at https://github.com/NEZNAMY/TAB/wiki/config.yml

change-nametag-prefix-suffix: true
change-tablist-prefix-suffix: true
enable-header-footer: true

nametag-refresh-interval-milliseconds: 1000
tablist-refresh-interval-milliseconds: 1000
header-footer-refresh-interval-milliseconds: 100

header:
  - ""
  - "%animation:Welcome%%nick% "
  - "&a当前位于 &f%multiverse_world_alias%"
  - ""
  - "                                                                       "
footer:
  - ""
  - "&7浏览我们的官网 %animation:web% &7了解更多信息"
  - "&7添加我们的Q群 %animation:qgroup% &7交流游戏内容"
  - '&a在线玩家 &b&l▶ &f&l%online%'
  - " "
  - " "

tablist-objective: PING
tablist-objective-custom-value: "%some_placeholderapi_placeholder%"
group-sorting-priority-list:
  - helper
  - builder
  - premium
  - player
  - vip
Groups:
  player:
    tabprefix: "&7▫ &7"
    tagprefix: "&7▫ &7"
    tabsuffix: "&r %deluxetags_tag%"
    tagprefix: "&r %deluxetags_tag%"
  vip:
    tabprefix: "&aVIP &e"
    tabsuffix: "&r %deluxetags_tag%"
    tagprefix: "&aVIP &e"
    tagprefix: "&r %deluxetags_tag%"
  example_group:
    header:
      - "This is an example of per-group header/footer"
    footer:
      - "applied to a group"
  _OTHER_:
    tabprefix: "%deluxetags_tag%&r %vault-prefix%"
    tagprefix: "%deluxetags_tag%&r %vault-prefix%"
    tabsuffix: "%afk%"
    tagsuffix: "%afk%"
    customtabname: "%essentialsnick%"
    customtagname: "%essentialsnick%"
    
  VIP:
    tabprefix: "%deluxetags_tag%&r %vault-prefix%&e"
    tagprefix: "%deluxetags_tag%&r %vault-prefix%&e"
Users:
  _NEZNAMY_:
    tabprefix: "&6&lTAB Author &a"
    tagprefix: "&6&lTAB &r&a"
    abovename: "&bOh look, 3 lines of text !"
    belowname: "&eThere's only one plugin out there supporting it"

belowname:
  enabled: false
  refresh-interval-milliseconds: 200
  number: "%health%"
  text: "Health"

enable-collision: true
revert-collision-rule-in-worlds:
  - revertedworld
do-not-move-spectators: false
unlimited-nametag-prefix-suffix-mode:
  enabled: false
  modify-npc-names: false

per-world-settings:
  world1:
    header:
      - "an example of world with custom"
    footer:
      - "header/footer and prefix/suffix"
    Groups:
      Owner:
        tabprefix: "&0&l[&a&lOwner&0&l] &a"
        tagprefix: "&2&lOwner &a"
  world2-world3:
    header:
      - "This is a shared header for"
      - "world2 and world3"
placeholders:
  afk-yes: " &cafk."
  afk-no: ""
  date-format: "dd.MM.yyyy"
  time-format: "[HH:mm:ss / h:mm a]"
  time-offset: 0
  remove-strings:
    - "[]"
    - "< >"
rank-aliases:
  Admin: "&4&lADMIN"
  Mod: "&b&lMOD"
  Premium: "&6&lPREMIUM"
  Ultra: "&b&lULTRA"
  Legend: "&a&lLEGEND"
  Titan: "&c&lTITAN"
  Youtuber: "&c&lYOUTUBE"
  _OTHER_: "&7No Rank"
  
disable-features-in-worlds:
  header-footer:
    - disabledworld
  tablist-names:
    - disabledworld
  nametag:
    - disabledworld
  tablist-objective:
    - disabledworld
  bossbar:
    - disabledworld
  belowname:
    - disabledworld复制代码

replies.author: renyunzhong
replies.txt_content:
tablist-objective: PING
tablist-objective-custom-value: "%some_placeholderapi_placeholder%"复制代码

根据tab插件说明，这里改成别的，像是生命值之类的
延迟纯属网络问题，可以试着开几个内网穿透看能否有所缓解

replies.author: Misaka__Mikoto
replies.txt_content:
延迟太高是你网络问题
和插件无关
建议开内网穿透或升级宽带

replies.author: Stant_hed
replies.txt_content: 这是假的延迟，我服务器也这样还日常-1...输入/ping 真实延迟一般在30ms内
